description:
The ShorelineMonitor dataset provides raw shoreline series extracted from annually composited Landsat imagery. 
These data include shoreline positions and derived metrics for monitoring coastal change globally.

data.title: ShorelineMonitor: Raw Shoreline Series
data.description: Parquet dataset containing raw shoreline observations for coastal monitoring.

table:columns.name: transect_id
table:columns.description: Unique identifier for the transect, combining coastline, segment, and distance information.

table:columns.name: shoreline_id
table:columns.description: Unique identifier for the shoreline observation.

table:columns.name: obs_id
table:columns.description: Unique identifier for the observation, combining transect_id and a datetime-sorted observation index.

table:columns.name: datetime
table:columns.description: Timestamp of the shoreline observation.

table:columns.name: geometry
table:columns.description: Shoreline geometry represented as a WKB (Well-Known Binary) LineString.

table:columns.name: lon
table:columns.description: Longitude coordinate of the shoreline observation.

table:columns.name: lat
table:columns.description: Latitude coordinate of the shoreline observation.

table:columns.name: shoreline_position
table:columns.description: Normalized shoreline position relative to the reference chainage.

table:columns.name: chainage
table:columns.description: Distance along the transect, measured from its start point.

table:columns.name: utm_epsg
table:columns.description: EPSG code representing the UTM Coordinate Reference System of the observation.

table:columns.name: transect_lon
table:columns.description: Longitude coordinate of the transect origin.

table:columns.name: transect_lat
table:columns.description: Latitude coordinate of the transect origin.

table:columns.name: quadkey
table:columns.description: Quadkey spatial index for the observation location.

table:columns.name: bbox
table:columns.description: Bounding box defining the spatial extent of the observation (minx, miny, maxx, maxy).

table:columns.name: sinuosity
table:columns.description: Ratio of the actual shoreline length to its straight-line length, indicating complexity.

table:columns.name: self_intersection_density
table:columns.description: Density of self-intersections per unit length of the shoreline geometry.

table:columns.name: fractal_dimension
table:columns.description: Measure of the shoreline's fractal complexity.

table:columns.name: is_shoal
table:columns.description: Flag indicating whether the shoreline lies over a shoal.

table:columns.name: obs_group
table:columns.description: Identifier for the group of aggregated shoreline observations.

table:columns.name: obs_group_stdev
table:columns.description: Standard deviation of shoreline positions within the observation group.

table:columns.name: obs_group_range
table:columns.description: Range of shoreline positions within the observation group.

table:columns.name: obs_group_count
table:columns.description: Number of observations within the observation group.

table:columns.name: obs_is_qa
table:columns.description: Flag indicating whether the observation passed quality assurance checks.

table:columns.name: obs_is_primary
table:columns.description: Flag indicating whether the observation is the primary observation in its group.

table:columns.name: obs_is_step_change
table:columns.description: Flag indicating a significant step change in the shoreline position.

table:columns.name: obs_is_outlier
table:columns.description: Flag indicating whether the observation is considered an outlier.

table:columns.name: obs_count
table:columns.description: Total number of observations recorded for this group.

table:columns.name: obs_mdn_offset
table:columns.description: Offset of the observation from the median of primary observations in its group.

table:columns.name: subseries_id
table:columns.description: Identifier for multiple groups within the observation series.

table:columns.name: reference_datetime
table:columns.description: Timestamp of the reference point, typically the most recent primary observation.

table:columns.name: reference_chainage
table:columns.description: Chainage of the reference point, typically the most recent primary observation.

table:columns.name: reference_lon
table:columns.description: Longitude of the reference point.

table:columns.name: reference_lat
table:columns.description: Latitude of the reference point.

table:columns.name: obs_primary_count
table:columns.description: Count of primary observations in the group.

table:columns.name: obs_primary_mdn
table:columns.description: Median shoreline position for primary observations.

table:columns.name: tr_stdev
table:columns.description: Standard deviation of shoreline positions across the transect.

table:columns.name: tr_range
table:columns.description: Range (max - min) of shoreline positions along the transect.

table:columns.name: tr_qa_pct
table:columns.description: Percentage of observations in the transect that passed quality assurance checks.

table:columns.name: tr_is_qa
table:columns.description: Flag indicating whether the transect meets quality assurance criteria.

table:columns.name: dist_b330
table:columns.description: GCTR: Distance to OSM Coastline intersection at bearing 330.

table:columns.name: dist_b0
table:columns.description: GCTR: Distance to OSM Coastline intersection at bearing 0.

table:columns.name: dist_b30
table:columns.description: GCTR: Distance to OSM Coastline intersection at bearing 30.

table:columns.name: min_dist
table:columns.description: Minimum distance to a OSM Coastline (from B330, B0, and B30).

table:columns.name: offshore_domain
table:columns.description: Maximum offshore distance (search domain) for the shoreline position, typically half the min distance if there is an intersecting OSM Coastline.

table:columns.name: otsu_threshold
table:columns.description: Threshold value determined by Otsu's method for water detection.

table:columns.name: otsu_separability
table:columns.description: Separability score for water classification using Otsu's method.

table:columns.name: composite:start_datetime
table:columns.description: Start date and time of the composite period used for shoreline determination.

table:columns.name: composite:end_datetime
table:columns.description: End date and time of the composite period used for shoreline determination.

table:columns.name: composite:determination_datetimes
table:columns.description: Array of timestamps representing the images used in the composite period.

table:columns.name: composite:image_id
table:columns.description: Identifier for the composite image used in shoreline detection.

table:columns.name: composite:cloud_cover
table:columns.description: Array of cloud cover percentages for the composite images.

table:columns.name: country
table:columns.description: Country code of the shoreline observation location.

table:columns.name: common_country_name
table:columns.description: Common name of the country where the observation is located.
